CustomField.description: Used by Conga Trigger to automatically generate NPS PDF Document and email completed document to MD.
CustomField.formula: "&Id=" + Id + "&QueryId=[Question2]0Q_002UAA254265," + "[Question3]0Q_003UAA829410," + "[Question4]0Q_004UAA328222," + "[Question5]0Q_005UAA378520," + "[Question6]0Q_006UAA015579," + "[Question7]0Q_007UAA039638," + "[Question8]0Q_008UAA540193," + "[Question9]0Q_009UAA319475," + "[NPSRecordData]0Q_000UAA924864," + "[Question1]0Q_001UAA490645," + "[Question10]0Q_010UAA444287," + "[Question11]0Q_011UAA044732," + "[Question12]0Q_012UAA914661," + "[FurtherComments]0Q_013UAA712034" + "&TemplateId=0T_001UAA761155" + "&DefaultPDF=1" + "&OFN=NPS Survey - " + Account__r.Name + " - " + TEXT(DAY( TODAY() )) + "-" + TEXT(MONTH( TODAY() )) + "-" + TEXT(YEAR( TODAY() )) + "&DS7=12" + "&SC0=1" + "&SC1=attachments" + "&EmailAdditionalTo=" + MD_Email__c + "," + NPS_Surveyor_Email__c + IF(ISBLANK(Ops_Director__r.Email),NULL,"," + Ops_Director__r.Email) + "&EmailCC=salesforce@ocs.com" + "&EmailSubject=" + Name + " Completed - "+ Account__r.Name + "&EmailFromId=0D2Tw00000002eX" + "&CongaEmailTemplateId=0E_000EAT912997" + "&QMode=SendEmail"
CustomField.label: System: Conga Generate NPS Document
